description: Use this resource to create a dayu CC self-define http policy

Operator.description: Operator of the rule, valid values are `include`, `not_include`, `equal`.

Skey.description: Key of the rule, valid values are `host`, `cgi`, `ua`, `referer`.

Value.description: Rule value, then length should be less than 31 bytes.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Action.description: Action mode, only valid when `smode` is `matching`. Valid values are `alg` and `drop`.

Frequency.description: Max frequency per minute, only valid when `smode` is `speedlimit`, the valid value ranges from 1 to 10000.

Ip.description: Ip of the CC self-define http policy, only valid when `resource_type` is `bgp-multip`. The num of list items can only be set one.

Name.description: Name of the CC self-define http policy. Length should between 1 and 20.

ResourceId.description: ID of the resource that the CC self-define http policy works for.

ResourceType.description: Type of the resource that the CC self-define http policy works for, valid values are `bgpip`, `bgp`, `bgp-multip` and `net`.

Smode.description: Match mode, and valid values are `matching`, `speedlimit`. Note: the speed limit type CC self-define policy can only set one.

Switch.description: Indicate the CC self-define http policy takes effect or not.
